entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pemberton

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of wet snow or rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow or rain ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
